name: SOUND
description: This command will use an array of notes and beats (number of clock ticks to keep sound on) to make noise come out of the PC speaker.
syntax: SOUND note_array BEAT beat_array NUM num_of_notes FILE wav_file

parameters.name: note_array
parameters.description: An array of values that represent notes. Each note is the number 1,193,180/frequency desired. Must be an I type array.
